reviews.name: Vh Essentials Advanced/Sensitive Itching And Irritation Medicated Cream, 1.5 oz
reviews.reviewText: I like this product because all others out there do not work for me. They burn too much when putting it on me and have to remove it fast. This is better because it's for sensitive skin and has a better relieve when used. I recommend this product.
reviews.title: Awesome product!

reviews.name: Vh Essentials Advanced/Sensitive Itching And Irritation Medicated Cream, 1.5 oz
reviews.reviewText: This is the best product I have found for my problem. I have heat/yeast under breast and between legs. This product sooths and heals it faster than anything else I have used, including prescription medications. I CAN'T BELIEVE WAL-MART PULLED IT FROM THEIR SHELVES IN MY LOCAL STORE. I can, at least, can order it and have it delivered to my home.
reviews.title: Best product for this problem

reviews.name: Vh Essentials Advanced/Sensitive Itching And Irritation Medicated Cream, 1.5 oz

reviews.name: Vh Essentials Advanced/Sensitive Itching And Irritation Medicated Cream, 1.5 oz
reviews.reviewText: I bought this cream at Walmart quiet a while back ago and it is the best feminine cream for itching and irritation. I tried others before finding this one and they burned really bad and had to be washed off immediatly, but this one took all the discomfort away. I am glad to see I can buy it online because Walmart doesn't carry it any longer. I highly recommend it.
reviews.title: The best!
